content.raw:
My best guess is that in our testing it's been getting found through pkg-config information, which will create the imported target and skip over this block of code entirely.

Perhaps you hit a case where tinyxml2 was installed but its pkg-config file was missing (or never got installed) for some reason.
content.html:
My best guess is that in our testing it's been getting found through pkg-config information, which will create the imported target and skip over this block of code entirely.

Perhaps you hit a case where tinyxml2 was installed but its pkg-config file was missing (or never got installed) for some reason.
